document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 172''' was released in November of 2009 in online format only. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.Explore Airspur: Villains and Vagabonds:
: ''By [[Matt James]], illustrated by [[Wayne England]], Cartography by [[Jared Blando]].'' '''p. 100-105'''
More possible villains are detailed in the third and final installment that explores the city of [[Airspur]].
document_data.[[Eye on the Realms]]: Amreth Guant, Mas:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]], illustrated by [[Christopher Burdett]].'' '''p. 118-121'''
The east-west overland trade routes of the [[Heartlands]] spawn profitable, hard-bitten caravan companies and a certain breed of wily, worldly wise, independent traders. {{Dusup|172/Eye on the Realms: Amreth Guant, Master Merchant}}
